5.text:
We have got 5 social media posts which
lead to death but how about posts that were

10.text: made just moments before death? In this list we take a look at some pretty creepy

14.text: posts which were made just moments before somebody died

19.text:
The End...
Jamal Dewar also known as Capital Steez was

23.text:
an american rapper from brooklyn, new york.
He along with fellow rapper and friend joey

28.text:
badass and others founded the brooklyn based
rap group Pro Era.

32.text:
on Christmas eve 2012, the 19 year old was
found dead on the floor near the Cinematic

38.text:
Music Group headquarters in manhattan, new
york.

41.text:
He was found on the pavement clutching a bible.
He had comitted suicide by jumping off the

45.text:
rooftop of the headquarters.
At some time during 11pm on december 23rd,

50.text:
2012 he made his way to the rooftop of the
headquarters he then texted a few of his close

55.text:
friends to tell them that he loved them, then
at exactly 11:59pm he posted a tweet saying

62.text:
"the end" its believed he then jumped
off the rooftop

65.text:
Its thought that he killed himself because
he was suffering from depression.

69.text:
there are several mysteries and conspiracies
surrounding his death.

72.text:
details about the rappers death are still
sketchy today.

75.text:
following his death, fans and the media were
unable to get any details about it.

80.text:
this was until almost a year later, an magazine
by the name of the fader featured a

85.text:
lengthy article about him, they interviewed
his close friends who revealed he

89.text:
was unhappy because of his lack of recognition
as an artist.

93.text:
the article also released that he was interested
in numerology, new age spirituality and egyptian

99.text:
mysticism.
Throughout the media more information appeared,

103.text:
Jamal was said to be a frequent user of cannabis
and magic mushrooms

107.text:
he was also obsessed with the number 47 and
would make strange facebook posts relating

112.text:
to it.
he believed the world was going to end in

114.text:
the year 2047.
all the mystery sparked several conspiracy

118.text:
theories to appear online.
One theory that emerged was that Capital Steez

122.text:
was murdered, theorist believe
he was murdered because he was out spoken

126.text: and tried to reveal the truth and was also very anti government. Another theory was that he faked his death

132.text: to boost record sales, this stemmed because of all the material which continued to be

136.text:
released after his death.
Others believe he was just schizophrenic and

141.text:
decided to end his life because he couldn't
handle it.

145.text:
Ex Boyfriend Killer
59 year old Margaret Gee from orlando, florida

149.text:
was an avid medieval re-enactor,
in march of 2012 she was found dead with several

155.text:
gunshot wounds to her body,
She was babysitting her room mates child,

159.text:
once her room mate returned 2 hours later
they found maragaret's body.

162.text:
Just before she died she posted this on facebook,
it describes that she had just kicked out

167.text:
her ex-boyfriend
she also claimed he threatened her life and

170.text:
would search on the internet on how to make
different types of poison.

174.text:
her ex boyfriend by the name of scot stuut
was charged with her murder and was also charged

179.text:
with armed burglary.
its reported that the boyfriend claimed the

182.text: entire event was a misunderstanding, he also said he was looking up

186.text:
how to make poison because he was bored.
he then admitted that he shot and killed her

190.text:
with a handgun because she kicked him out
and verbally abused him.

196.text:
The Dead Are Living
Mitch Lucker was an american musician and

200.text:
lead singer of the death core band suicide
silence,

203.text:
formed in 2002, suicide silence perform a
fusion between death metal and metalcore,

209.text:
they were influenced by
bands like slipknot and korn.

212.text:
On the 31st of october 2012 Mitch made this
post to instagram with the caption, the dead

219.text:
are living.
Fans believe he predicted his own death as

222.text:
just hours later he died in an horrific motorbike
accident.

226.text: he crashed his motorbike at about 9pm, he was then taken into the hospital but was pronounced

231.text:
dead at 6.17am
following his death his bandmates held a memorial

239.text:
Final Selfie
Colette moreno was an 26 year old women from

244.text:
Missouri.
Her partner by the name of jesse had recently

246.text:
proposed to her,
while being driven to her hen party she posted

250.text:
this selfie on facebook,
shortly after the picture was taken colette

254.text:
was involved in an collison.
unfortunately she did not survive.

258.text: The driver survived, she explained that they was trying to pass a truck and they both thought

262.text: it was clear but were mistaken, they then saw a truck

265.text: heading for them and tried to swerve out of the way but they both

269.text:
swerved in the same direction.
the driver suffered from minor injuries.

273.text:
Colette left behind her five year old son
and husband.

276.text:
her husband said she was so excited for the
wedding.

280.text:
Dark Knight
Alex sullivan was a 27 year old bartender,

284.text:
on his 27th birthday he went to go and watch
the dark knight rises with his friends at

289.text: the cinema. seems to be a fairly standard

291.text:
tweet nothing alarming about it, well lets
check the date.

294.text:
Look familiar? this was the date in which
a mass shooting occurred inside a movie theatre

299.text:
in aurora colorado.
the shooter was James Holmes

302.text:
while dressed in tactical clothing he made
his way to the theatre in time for the midnight

307.text:
screening of the dark knight rises
he then set off tear gas and shot into the

311.text:
audience with multiple firearms.
he killed 12 people and injured 70 others,

316.text:
one of those 12 was alex sullivan.
James was convicted of 24 counts of first

321.text:
degree murder and 140 counts of attempted
murder.

324.text:
then on august 26th 2015 he was given 12 life
sentences and 3318 years for the attempted
